mapper.select: SELECT member_email, member_name FROM Member WHERE member_email = #{email}
SELECT member_email, member_name FROM Member WHERE member_id = #{id}
select M.*, A.authority from Member M inner join authorities A on M.member_no = A.member_no where M.member_id= #{id};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Member WHERE member_id = #{id}
select member_no from Member where member_no = (select max(member_no) from Member)
select count(*) from Member M inner join authorities A on M.member_no = A.member_no where M.enabled = 1

select M.member_no, M.member_id, M.member_email, M.member_name, M.member_birth, M.genres, M.postcode, M.address, M.detailAddress, M.extraAddress, M.member_recent_login, M.member_recent_logout, M.enabled, A.authority from Member M inner join authorities A on M.member_no = A.member_no where M.enabled = 1 limit #{start}, #{end}
select count(*) from Member M inner join authorities A on M.member_no = A.member_no where M.enabled = 0

select M.member_no, M.member_id, M.member_email, M.member_name, M.member_birth, M.genres, M.postcode, M.address, M.detailAddress, M.extraAddress, M.member_recent_login, M.member_recent_logout, M.enabled, A.authority from Member M inner join authorities A on M.member_no = A.member_no where M.enabled = 0 limit #{start}, #{end}
mapper.update: update Member set member_recent_login = SYSDATE() where member_id = #{id}
update Member set member_recent_logout = SYSDATE() where member_id = #{id}
update Member set enabled = 0 where member_no = #{mno}
update Member set enabled = 1 where member_no = #{mno}
update Member set member_pw =#{pw}, genres =#{genres}, postcode = #{postcode}, address = #{address}, detailAddress = #{detailAddress}, extraAddress = #{extraAddress} where member_id =#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member ( member_no, member_id, member_pw, member_email, member_name, member_birth, genres, postcode, address, detailaddress, extraaddress, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{member_no}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{genres}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress}, SYSDATE() )
